department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: “This course is an introduction to software engineering, using the Java? programming language. Students will learn the fundamentals of Java. The focus is on developing high quality, working software that solves real problems.“
goal.ch: “學生將學習Java的基礎知識。 重點是開發能夠解決實際問題的高質量工作軟件。“

content.en:
“This course is an introduction to software engineering, using the Java? programming language. Students will learn the fundamentals of Java. The focus is on developing high quality, working software that solves real problems.
1. Introduction to Java
2. Primitive Data Types and Operations
3. Control Statements
4. Methods, Arrays
5. Objects and Classes, Strings
6. Getting Started with GUI Programming
7. Creating User Interfaces
8. Applets and Advanced GUI
9. Exception Handling
10. Internationalization
11. Multithreading
12. Input and Output
13. Networking“
content.ch:
“本課程是使用Java語言進行軟件工程的介紹。學生將學習Java的基礎知識。 重點是開發能夠解決實際問題的高質量工作軟件。
1. Introduction to Java
2. Primitive Data Types and Operations
3. Control Statements
4. Methods, Arrays
5. Objects and Classes, Strings
6. Getting Started with GUI Programming
7. Creating User Interfaces
8. Applets and Advanced GUI
9. Exception Handling
10. Internationalization
11. Multithreading
12. Input and Output
13. Networking“

textbook.en: “Introduction to Java Programming, 10E by Y. Daniel Liang“
textbook.ch: “Introduction to Java Programming, 10E by Y. Daniel Liang“

method.en: Lecture Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: “First Midterm 30％ Second Midterm 30％ Final Project 30％ Assignment 10％ Participation (+/-％)“
grading.ch: “第一次期中上機考 30％ 第二次期中上機考 30％ 期末專案 30％ 上課答題 10％ 出席率 (+/-％)“

domain.en: 人工智慧、資料科學與多媒體研究群
domain.ch: 人工智慧、資料科學與多媒體研究群
